rules.name: Fluid Volume Deficit
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates negative fluid balance and nurse input mentions 'dehydration' or 'poor skin turgor'.
rules.generated_alert: Risk for fluid volume deficit. Encourage oral intake or administer IV fluids as ordered.

rules.name: Fluid Volume Excess
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates positive fluid balance and nurse input mentions 'edema' or 'crackles'.
rules.generated_alert: Risk for fluid volume excess. Monitor for signs of fluid overload and administer diuretics as prescribed.
